Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.resourceContainers

Class ResourceContainer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.resourceContainers.ResourceContainer
public class ResourceContainer
extends java.lang.Object
ResourceContainer is a container of only one type of resource with its amount.

    • decreaseAmount

      public int decreaseAmount​(int amount)
      Parameters:
      amount - stands for the amount of ResourceContainer-type resource to decrease.
      Returns:
      0 if ResourceContainer amount is higher than @param amount, otherwise @return the amount of not decreased resource and set amount = 0.
